task.title: Upgrading to a new version or applying a fixpack
task.shortdesc: Newer versions and fix packs contain new features and fixes. You do not need to remove your current Sametime 12 installation when upgrading to a new version.

prereq.p:
To install a new version or fix pack, the following conditions must be satisfied:
HCL Sametime 12 version is installed and configured
Sametime server has access to a MongoDB server
